"In the Driving Rain 2020":
"Violent enemies have been appearing in
the Corrupted Area of planet Naberius.
Abnormal weather conditions have also
been observed. We want to investigate
whether these phenomena are connected.
Investigate the area while defeating as
many enemies as possible.
―――――――――――――――――――
Quest Points are shared amongst the room.
Quest ends when time limit expires."

"Now beginning the transfer.
Your objective is to investigate
the appearance of violent
enemies within this area."

"According to our reports,
the number of violent enemies
increases after a sudden
change in the weather."

"It's currently raining, but we
predict rapid climatic changes
within the combat zone.
Proceed with caution."
